languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}Fires{/g} 5 {g|Encyclopedia:ShortBurningSpace}short-burning{/g} torpedo salvos with plasma warheads. Each torpedo deals 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a direct hit and 13 damage within a 1-cell area on a miss, detonating on a {g|Encyclopedia:ProximityFuseSpace}proximity fuse{/g}.
Short-burning torpedoes have greater {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} but a shorter lifetime.
<indent=5%>Reload: 1 round</indent>

Feuert 5 Torpedosalven mit kurzer Brennzeit mit Plasmasprengköpfen ab. Jeder Torpedo verursacht 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} bei einem direkten Treffer und 13 Schaden in einem 1-Feld-Bereich beim Verfehlen und detoniert mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}Annäherungszünder{/g}.
Torpedos mit kurzer Brennzeit haben eine höhere {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}Geschwindigkeit{/g}, höheres {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Ausweichen{/g} und eine höhere {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}Manövrierbarkeit{/g}, aber eine kürzere Lebensdauer.
<indent=5%>Nachladen: 1 Runde</indent>
languages.original_text:
Fires 5 short-burning torpedo salvos with plasma warheads. Each torpedo deals 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a direct hit and 13 damage within a 1-cell area on a miss, detonating on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}proximity fuse{/g}.
Short-burning torpedoes have greater {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} but a shorter lifetime.
<indent=5%>Reload: 1 round</indent>

languages.text:
Tire 5 salves de torpilles à combustion rapide avec des ogives à plasma. Chaque torpille inflige 19 points de dégâts en cas de hit direct et 13 points de dégâts dans une zone d'une case en cas de tir manqué, explosant sur une {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}fusée de proximité{/g}.
Les torpilles à combustion rapide sont plus performantes en termes de {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}vitesse{/g}, d'{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}évasion{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manœuvrabilité{/g}, leur durée de vie est plus courte.
<indent=5%>Rechargement : 1 round</indent>
languages.original_text:
Fires 5 short-burning torpedo salvos with plasma warheads. Each torpedo deals 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a direct hit and 13 damage within a 1-cell area on a miss, detonating on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}proximity fuse{/g}.
Short-burning torpedoes have greater {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} but a shorter lifetime.
<indent=5%>Reload: 1 round</indent>

Fires 5 short-burning torpedo salvos with plasma warheads. Each torpedo deals 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a direct hit and 13 damage within a 1-cell area on a miss, detonating on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}proximity fuse{/g}.
Short-burning torpedoes have greater {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} but a shorter lifetime.
<indent=5%>Reload: 1 round</indent>

languages.text:
Dispara salvas de 5 torpedos de carga corta con ojivas de plasma. Cada torpedo inflige 19 de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daño{/g} si consigue un impacto directo y 13 de daño en un radio de 1 casilla si falla, usando un {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}detonador de proximidad{/g}.
Los torpedos de carga corta tienen mejor {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}velocidad{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasión{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}maniobrabilidad{/g}, pero su duración es más baja.
<indent=5%>Recarga: 1 asalto</indent>
languages.original_text:
Fires 5 short-burning torpedo salvos with plasma warheads. Each torpedo deals 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a direct hit and 13 damage within a 1-cell area on a miss, detonating on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}proximity fuse{/g}.
Short-burning torpedoes have greater {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} but a shorter lifetime.
<indent=5%>Reload: 1 round</indent>

languages.text:
プラズマ弾頭を搭載した短燃焼魚雷を5発発射する。魚雷は{g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}近接信管{/g}で爆発し、直撃時に19ダメージ、ミスした場合は1セル以内に13ダメージを与える。
{g|Encyclopedia:ShortBurningSpace}短燃焼{/g}魚雷は{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}スピード{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}回避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}操縦性{/g}が高いが、持続時間が短い。
<indent=5%>リロード：1ラウンド</indent>
languages.original_text:
Fires 5 short-burning torpedo salvos with plasma warheads. Each torpedo deals 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a direct hit and 13 damage within a 1-cell area on a miss, detonating on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}proximity fuse{/g}.
Short-burning torpedoes have greater {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} but a shorter lifetime.
<indent=5%>Reload: 1 round</indent>

languages.text:
Выпускает 5 залпов торпед ускоренного цикла с плазменными боеголовками. Каждая торпеда наносит 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урона{/g} при {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}прямом попадании{/g} и 13 урона в радиусе 1 клетки при промахе и детонации от неконтактного взрывателя.
У торпед ускоренного цикла выше {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}скорость{/g}, лучше {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}маневренность{/g} и больше возможностей для уклонения, но короче период эксплуатации.
<indent=5%>Перезарядка: 1 раунд</indent>
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}Fires{/g} 5 {g|Encyclopedia:ShortBurningSpace}short-burning{/g} torpedo salvos with plasma warheads. Each torpedo deals 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a direct hit and 13 damage within a 1-cell area on a miss, detonating on a {g|Encyclopedia:ProximityFuseSpace}proximity fuse{/g}.
Short-burning torpedoes have greater {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} but a shorter lifetime.
<indent=5%>Reload: 1 round</indent>
